pull.title: [25.x] qt: 25.1rc1 translations update
pull.body:
This PR pulls the recent translations from the [Transifex.com](https://www.transifex.com/bitcoin/bitcoin) using the [`bitcoin-maintainer-tools/update-translations.py`](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-maintainer-tools/blob/main/update-translations.py) tool.

According to our [Release Process docs](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/release-process.md#before-every-release-candidate), it is supposed to be merged before `v25.1rc1` tagging.

Changes in "Chinese (China) (zh_CN)" translation were manually discarded as they have too many removals (it looks like a vandalism).

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| ACK | [stickies-v](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28534#pullrequestreview-1649412264), [jarolrod](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28534#pullrequestreview-1649993747) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with 👎 to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
I have manually discarded changes in "German (de)" and  "Chinese (China) (zh_CN)" translations as they have too many removals and look like a vandalism.

ACK 40188072db24807a0f2721e0d4b63045601bffd9

Following the translation process and manually discarding the changes to `bitcoin_de.ts` and `bitcoin_ch_ZN.ts` (didn't inspect the translations in detail but those indeed look like vandalism), I have arrived at a zero diff with 40188072db24807a0f2721e0d4b63045601bffd9 (based on ecc74cd4f3ba26b4ae1fe1c08289971bed399597)

> Removed "Portuguese (QT FILETYPE)" translation, which has no point:

Was this removed on tx already? I didn't have to do any manual changes for this.
I will fix the German translation. It will take a day.

@Emzy 
> I will fix the German translation. It will take a day.

Thank you!

If this PR will be merged earlier (to not delaying 25.1rc1 tagging), the updated translation will be fetched for the next tag.

Picked up :)

Friendly ping @stickies-v @jarolrod. Once more :)
